content: I do not have a personal preference, but i can suggest that ultimately it depends on one's personal spiritual beliefs and interests. for someone interested in hinduism, haridwar, varanasi, or puri might be a good option, while those interested in buddhism can choose bodh gaya. rishikesh is an excellent choice for those interested in yoga and meditation, whereas those interested in sufi culture and philosophy can visit ajmer. the golden temple in amritsar is a great choice for those curious about sikhism. each place has its own unique cultural and religious significance and can offer a powerful and transformative spiritual experience.
